author: sroychow
body:
#### PR description:
In this PR, the SiStripMonitorDigi plugin is updated to comply with concurrent LS processing. Issue [#29050](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/25090).

#### PR validation:
This PR was checked with workflow - 136.856, 136.868. No changes seen. 

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
No backport is required.
title: Update Tracker DQM SiStripMonitorDigi for concurrent LS processing
